Megatron Revived:  "Then telling you know would only confuse you more.  Unl=
ess you absolutely have to know."
Blacknightmare: "Know what?" she said sof=
tly
Megatron Revived:  "My true feelings, what I keep hidden from everyone,=
 including you."
Blacknightmare: the femme laughted quietly and reply "Then=
 you are right when we are almost same spark...  almost same way to do thin=
gs..."
Megatron Revived:  "Oh really?  Then what do you think of me, honest=
ly?
Blacknightmare: that youre a good warrior, self-confidence one... an en=
igmatic bot, who still keep several secrets... what do you think about me?
=
Megatron revived:  "You are beautiful, intelligent, a warrior tired of figh=
ting it seems."
Blacknightmare: before all this situation, I knew for whom =
I was fightting... but now I don't know for what I'm fightting.... almost i=
t's a nosense to be a warrior with no a clear objective
Megatron Revived:  =
"You are fighting Unicron now.  Just as we are.  You have an objective.  Or=
 is thewre something else you are missing?"
Blacknightmare: The femme sighe=
d "Or battling for my survival...  '"
Megatron Revived:  He stepped closer,=
 knowing she was still holding back.  "There is something else."
Blackngiht=
mare: "what else? " she said softly
Megatron Revived:  He grinned a bit, th=
at evil grin of his.  "You are holding back something and so am I.  SO if y=
ou tell me what you won't tell me, I'll tell you what I have not told you."=

Blacknightmare: she looked down and said "All my universe was clear... No =
confutions, no doubts, my feelings was hold and that was fine...  Now I'm i=
n a chaos, things that I never have tought, feelings that I didn't let inte=
rferer with my warrior-career... Now  are unleashed... I have situations th=
at I didn't  face... Confution now it's part of my life... and now I'm not =
sure what I feel or what I like... "
Megatron Revived:  He steps closer and=
 brushes her cheek with the back of his left hand.  "I care for you, one mo=
st like me.  I see much of myself in you, it would pain me greatly to see y=
ou destroyed or worse."
Blacknightmare: The femme did a weak smile but felt=
 confused again, she apresiate this gesture but still a spark of love for M=
alice was inside her heart, how could her turned it off ?
Megatron revived:=
  He smiled a bit, putting his hand on her shoulder.
Blacknightmare didn't =
move, her heart was torn in two
Megatron Revived:  He lets go, saying what =
he had to say.  Now she had to deal with her emotions, something he could n=
ot make her do.
Blacknightmare: Blackngithmare slowly stood up sighing, she=
 started slowly to walk trought corritor without a specific place to go
Meg=
atron Revived:  After she left him, he checked the transponder signal from =
the small beacon he put on her, to make sure she stayed close.  He didn't w=
ant her to get hurt.
Blacknightmare:  Blacknightmare walked ramdoly in base=
, no thinking to go to Mess Hall, Malice may be there... with her. but not =
sure what to do next.
ere... with her. but not sure what to do next.
Megatr=
on Revived:  He goes to the base entrance and leaves for a bit, going outsi=
de to practice a bit with his sword.
Blacknightmare: Slowly the femme was g=
etting closer to entrace door, and she just stood up there... looking it wi=
th out move as if she was thinking if left the base or not, She looked Mega=
tron's trainning in silence 
 Megatron Revived:  He was already a master of=
 the sword, swinging in graceful arcs, each movement moves the sword to sla=
y an imaginary opponent.  His entire body is in motion, making the massive =
sword a trully lethal weapon.
Blacknightmare: the femme sit down and looked=
 interested
Megatron Revived:  He slashed the sword into the ground, then t=
urned tightly to slash again, then shove the sword forward, then swung it u=
p to his shoulder before spinning around with the sword.
Blacknightmare: th=
e femme stopped to look Megatron and looked the sky. the wind touched her a=
nd she feeel the willing to fly, in sky was the freedon, fear  and confutio=
n was behind,  She suddenly stood up not sure if took off or not
Megatron R=
evived:  He pauses to look around for something, then spots Blacknightmare.=
  He says nothing and watches her.
Blacknightmare: she looked him and with =
a weak smile she said "You' have a great skill with yours sword"
Megatron R=
evived:  He smirked a bit and walked to her, and handed her the sword.
Blac=
knightmare: the femme took the sword but she felt it a little heavy for her=
 to sue d it, dificulty she could move it but not  swing it
megatron Revive=
d:  he chuckled a bit.  "Heavy?"
Blacknightmare: "Yes..."she said with a wi=
de smile"I would rather mines"
Megatron Revived:  He took his sword back an=
d rested it on the ground, the tip in the ground.  "What sword do you use t=
hen?"
Blacknightmare:  The femme sit down close him and took two of her fea=
thers missiles and showing them to Megatron said "These ones, you can see t=
hat the border are sharp as  knifes"
Megatron Revived:  He looks at one clo=
sely, seeing that they would make very dangerous weapons in the hands of a =
skilled user.
Blacknightmare: the femme smirked when she looked Megatron, "=
Impressed with my 'Swords' ? "said the femme with a smile
essed with my 'Sw=
ords' ? "said the femme with a smile
Megatron Revived:  "Indeed, you could =
do a lot of damage with them.  I wonder, what else do you use besides these=
 feathers?
Blacknightmare: The femme reply "Blasters, I have two of them th=
at are part of my arms"  A blasted appeared  and as she had said, it was pa=
r of her arm "This blaster can't move alot and I just use it... when the ta=
rget can't move outside the Aim..."
Megatron Revived:  "I see.  I have my s=
word, the fusion cannon, stun missiles, shoulder cannons and head vulcans. =
 A one robot army perhaps."
Blacknightmare: "Yes"she said among laughs then=
 she smile"you're a army in one soldier, indeed"
Megatron Revived:  He laug=
hed a bit and dis connected his fusion cannon from his arm and set it aside=
, along with the sword and shield hanging on his left arm.
Blacknightmare: =
the femme smiled, by an unknow reason she was feeling better
Megatron Reviv=
ed:  he leans back a bit and looks up to the sky, at the clouds and such.  =
The sun shined bright on his chest, making his insignia bright and stand ou=
t.
Blacknightmare: "Can you fly?"she said suddenly
Megatron Revived:  He lo=
oks over to her, rather suprised.  "Of course.  Not only as a Decepticon, b=
ut my alternate form is a gunship, capible of intersteller flight."
Blackni=
ghtmare: "I see..."she said soflty "told me... are ya here to be sure that =
I'm fine or this meeting just was a coincidence? "
 Megatron Revived:  He a=
rches a brow.  "I believe it is a coincidence."
 Blacknightmare: the femme =
smiled "Yes"she said sofly "it just a coincidence"
Megatron Revived:  "You =
seem to believe otherwise."
Blacknightmare: "I didn't plannet a meeting her=
e... and I guess that you wasn't following me "
Megatron Revived:  He male =
did not sa anything, looking upward.  He didn't believe in fate, but maybe =
there was a force that made things happen for what reason he did not know.
=
Blacknightmare: the femme lie down, looking to shinning sun and the beauty =
sky
